data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (failed_notifications IS NULL OR failed_notifications = 0)) AS 'Health Score' FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic FACET amazon_sns_sns_topic_name
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_sns_sns_topic_name) AS 'SNS Topics' FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic FACET region

presentation.title: Region Distribution
presentation.notes: The AWS Region this object belongs to.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_size_of_messages_published) FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Size of Messages Published (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The average size of published messages.

data.nrql: SELECT average(sms_success_rate) FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: SMS Success Rate
presentation.notes: The rate of successful SMS message deliveries.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(confirmed_subscriptions) FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Confirmed Subscriptions
presentation.notes: The number of confirmed subscriptions on this topic.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(deleted_subscriptions) FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Deleted Subscriptions
presentation.notes: The number of deleted subscriptions on this topic.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(pending_subscriptions) FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Pending Subscriptions
presentation.notes: The number of subscriptions pending confirmation on this topic.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(delivered_notifications) FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Delivered Notifications
presentation.notes: The number of messages successfully delivered.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(failed_notifications) FROM amazon_sns_sns_topic COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Failed Notifications
presentation.notes: The number of messages that failed to deliver.
